name: OctOpUs GaMe (haywireSSC)
description:
space - advance text

click - shoot

arrows/WASD - move

Made for a competition in scratch over the course of a few weeks. I had 2 failed attempts with similar snake physics to the boss in this.  The theme was out of place and I poorly implemented it, you were supposed to think the glitchy robots were out of place when you where whats out of palce, disturbing the fish.

Music:

Mello C - Lovusuno, Jim Hall - Wanderlust, Jim Hall - The Contra Chop, Origami Repetika - Honeyknocker Meadows, Origami Repetika - Shanty of Mermaidia
